lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby can't seem to find the right word for what's happening. If the Pittsburgh Penguins captain is being honest, he is not really interested in finding one. He would rather just enjoy a hot streak that is bordering on absurd even by his remarkably high standards.

headline.print_headline: Sid's Surge: Crosby on a Goal-Scoring Tear for Penguins
headline.main: Sid's Surge: Crosby on a Goal-Scoring Tear for Penguins
